sql:
SELECT 
    shijiaotongweikebianqingbaobanshebeixinxi3519.唯一标识, 
    shijiaotongweikebianqingbaobanshebeixinxi3519.名称, 
    shijiaotongweikebianqingbaobanshebeixinxi3519.设备编码, 
    shunyiqugongjiaoxianlujizhandianjibenxinxi2076.线路运营信息, 
    shunyiqugongjiaoxianlujizhandianjibenxinxi2076.Unnamed: 1, 
    shunyiqugongjiaoxianlujizhandianjibenxinxi2076.Unnamed: 2 
FROM 
    shijiaotongweikebianqingbaobanshebeixinxi3519 
JOIN 
    shunyiqugongjiaoxianlujizhandianjibenxinxi2076 
ON 
    shijiaotongweikebianqingbaobanshebeixinxi3519.设备编码 = shunyiqugongjiaoxianlujizhandianjibenxinxi2076.Unnamed: 1 
WHERE 
    shijiaotongweikebianqingbaobanshebeixinxi3519.名称 = '指定名称' 
AND 
    shunyiqugongjiaoxianlujizhandianjibenxinxi2076.Unnamed: 2 = '指定值' 
AND 
    (shunyiqugongjiaoxianlujizhandianjibenxinxi2076.线路运营信息, shunyiqugongjiaoxianlujizhandianjibenxinxi2076.Unnamed: 3) = ('指定信息', '指定值')
